module: Module-level comment: The `cntr_3ud_tb` is a testbench for validating an up/down counter (`cntr_3ud`). It uses internal signals (`up_down`, `clk`, `reset`, `bin_count`, `new_count`) to test count functionality and direction control, toggling `clk` every 5 units and initializing with `reset`. The `always` block evaluates the DUT output against expected values, altering `up_down` via the `stimulus` task, and outputs pass/fail results. Simulation terminates post 200 time units with `$finish`.
